Posts.EditableText: Today twitter informs me of the recent death of game designer and industry pioneer John Wilson. Seems a lot of the first generation are passing away now… makes me a little sad. Now I'll be trying to find a copy of John's classic text adventure Behind Closed Doors (1988; ZX Spectrum) for a little nostalgia trip. If you've not tried it, I'd recommend giving it a look. I believe it was the first 'escape room' text adventure, and had an astonishing number of sequels.
